definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

second of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/second in order/letter "B" or Roman "II" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/second party (in legal contract, usually 乙方[yi3 fang1], as opposed to 甲方[jia3 fang1])/ethyl/bent/winding/radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 5)/ancient Chinese compass point: 105°
turning stroke (in Chinese characters)/see also 折[zhe2]

sentences.english: It is easier to install a PVC liner in a squarer pond.
sentences.chinese: 聚氯乙烯是易于安装在一个平方衬垫水池。

sentences.english: Main factors influencing wear-resistance of PVC plastic floor were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了影响聚氯乙烯塑料地板耐磨性的主要因素。

sentences.english: We are looking for soft, durable, embossed PVC leather.
sentences.chinese: 我们在寻找柔软的，耐用的压花聚氯乙烯皮革。

sentences.english: The cold resistance is an important property of soft polyvinyl chloride(PVC).
sentences.chinese: 耐寒性是软质聚氯乙烯的重要性能指标之一。

sentences.english: The oxygen-generating bag is made of PVC plastic film, and the oxygen-generating powder is sodium carbonate peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 产氧袋由聚氯乙烯薄膜制成，产氧剂为过碳酸钠。

sentences.english: Yexian enjoys advantageous production conditions with rich PVC salinization products.
sentences.chinese: 本地有丰富的聚氯乙烯盐化工产品，生产条件优越。

sentences.english: Recycled PVC weights provide a high visibility, non-slip secure base that does not penetrate the roof membrane.
sentences.chinese: 再生聚氯乙烯保证了高能见度，防滑安全。

sentences.english: We stopped discharging polyvinyl chloride, because it rained cats and dogs last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚因为下起了大雨，我们停止了卸聚氯乙烯。

sentences.english: In this thesis, dipping molded PVC was as the main studying object.
sentences.chinese: 本论文以聚氯乙烯浸塑成型件为主要研究对象。
